text:
A Biblical local church in the East with a welcoming community. They are eager to spread the Gospel in Biblical Truth, not undermining the Truth of God's word. I highly suggest visiting this Church!

Their services: Tamil, 11am English, 1pm Chinese. There is combined service with English and Chinese on every 2nd Sunday and Events

Romans 10:9
If you declare with your mouth, “Jesus is Lord,” and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
Great fellowship. If visiting Singapore and want to go to church
Flowers planted at the facade of my Church.
